Title: Forbidden Fruit
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Manny Coto, Joshua Green (executive story editor), Asha Michelle Wilson (staff writer)
Actors: Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Adina Porter, Billie Lourd
Plot: Ms. Venable and Ms. Mead enact a sinister plan on Halloween, while a figure from the past resurfaces.
